title: Best Sellers Cleaned Dataset
description: This dataset contains information on products listed on Amazon, including details such as name, price, ratings, reviews, and seller information. The dataset is intended for use in e-commerce analysis, product research, and data-driven marketing studies.
citation: If using this dataset, please cite as: Amazon Bird Food Dataset, curated by Octaprice, 2025.

columns.name: additionalProperties
columns.description: A collection of product-specific details, including MPAA rating, dimensions, media format, run time, release date, actors, dubbed languages, studio, ASIN, country of origin, and best sellers rank. This provides a variety of information that can be used for filtering, sorting, and detailed product display.
columns.example: [{"name": "mpaa rating", "value": "PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)"}, {"name": "product dimensions", "value": "1 x 1 x 1 inches; 2.4 ounces"}, {"name": "media format", "value": "4K, Blu-ray, Digital_copy"}, {"name": "run time", "value": "1 hour and 49 minutes"}, {"name": "release date", "value": "April 15, 2025"}, {"name": "actors", "value": "Jim Carrey, Ben Schwartz, Krysten Ritter, Idris Elba, Keanu Reeves"}, {"name": "dubbed:  :", "value": "Spanish, French"}, {"name": "studio", "value": "PARAMOUNT"}, {"name": "asin", "value": "B0DTQCFGX3"}, {"name": "country of origin", "value": "USA"}, {"name": "best sellers rank", "value": "#1 in Movies & TV (See Top 100 in Movies & TV) #1 in Action & Adventure Blu-ray Discs"}]

columns.name: brandName
columns.description: The brand or manufacturer name of the product. It's useful for filtering and identifying products from specific brands.

columns.name: breadcrumbs
columns.description: A hierarchical list of categories that the product belongs to, often used to guide navigation and filtering. It shows the path of categories from general to specific, e.g., 'Movies & TV' to 'Action & Adventure'.

columns.name: color
columns.description: The color or color combination of the product. It is useful for filtering and product selection based on visual appeal.

columns.name: currency
columns.description: The currency code for the product's price, typically 'USD' for United States Dollars.

columns.name: current_depth
columns.description: The current depth of the item within a hierarchical category structure, where 1 indicates the top-level category.

columns.name: description
columns.description: A textual description of the product, which is often a concise version of the description.
columns.example: Amazon Exclusive 4K UHD + BD Steelbook, Amazon Exclusive Edition

columns.name: descriptionRaw
columns.description: The raw HTML or markup version of the product description, which often contains formatting or layout information.
columns.example: Amazon Exclusive 4K UHD + BD Steelbook, Amazon Exclusive Edition

columns.name: features
columns.description: A list of key features of the product, often presented as bullet points or short statements describing its characteristics or benefits.
columns.example: ["INCLUDES: 100 Regular-size standard-absorbency puppy pee pads; ideal for puppy training, senior dogs, car trips, and more", "5-LAYER PROTECTION: Multi-layer construction with quick-dry surface and absorbent core that turns liquid into gel on contact", "LEAKPROOF: Plastic lining keeps floors safe from damage; plastic border on all 4 sides to prevent overflow", "BUILT-IN ATTRACTANT: Helps aid in potty training", "PRODUCT DIMENSIONS: 22 x 22 inches (LxW, overall); 19 x 19 inches (LxW, center pad); 1.65 inch border"]

columns.name: gtin
columns.description: The Global Trade Item Number (GTIN) for the product, which is a unique identifier used to track trade items. It is given as an array of objects, where each object contains a type and a value.

columns.name: imageUrls
columns.description: A list of URLs pointing to images of the product. These URLs can be used to display product visuals on a website or application.

columns.name: inStock
columns.description: A boolean value indicating whether the product is currently available in stock. This field is useful for filtering products by availability.

columns.name: listedPrice
columns.description: The listed price of the product. This is the price at which the product is offered for sale, typically in a specific currency.

columns.name: material
columns.description: The primary material from which the product is made. This field provides information about the composition of the product and can help users make informed purchase decisions.

columns.name: mpn
columns.description: The manufacturer part number for the product. This is a unique identifier assigned by the manufacturer, which can be useful for inventory management and product identification.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The name or title of the product, typically including details such as the brand, model, and specific attributes.
columns.example: Sonic The Hedgehog 3 Amazon Exclusive [4K Steelbook + Blu-Ray + Digital Copy]

columns.name: new_path
columns.description: The category path of the product, representing its location in the product hierarchy.

columns.name: nodeName
columns.description: The name of the product category, indicating the top-level grouping to which the product belongs.

columns.name: rating
columns.description: The average rating of the product based on user reviews, typically on a scale of 1 to 5 stars.

columns.name: reviewCount
columns.description: The total number of reviews submitted by users for the specific product.

columns.name: salePrice
columns.description: The current price of the product on sale, represented as a floating-point number.

columns.name: scrapedDate
columns.description: The date and time when the product data was scraped, in ISO 8601 format.

columns.name: size
columns.description: The dimensions and weight of the product, formatted as a string.

columns.name: sku
columns.description: The unique Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) identifier for the product on Amazon.

columns.name: style
columns.description: The style or design variation of the product, such as 'Regular' or 'Slim'.

columns.name: url
columns.description: The URL of the product page on Amazon.

columns.name: variants
columns.description: A list of product variants, each specified as a JSON object with attributes like size.
columns.example: [{"size": "Giant (40 Count)"}, {"size": "X-Large (40 Count)"}, {"size": "Regular (50 Count)"}, {"size": "X-Large (60 Count)"}, {"size": "Regular (150 Count)"}, {"size": "X-Large (25 Count)"}, {"size": "Giant (30 Count)"}, {"size": "X-Large (50 Count)"}, {"size": "Regular (80 Count)"}, {"size": "Regular (100 Count)"}]

columns.name: weight_rawUnit
columns.description: The original unit of weight measurement as found on the product page.

columns.name: weight_unit
columns.description: The standardized unit of weight measurement.

columns.name: weight_value
columns.description: The numerical value of the product's weight.

usage: For non-commercial, academic, and research purposes only.
